functionDecorators.name: pEther
functionDecorators.description: The default cEther market to repay in.

functionDecorators.name: repayBehalf
functionDecorators.description: msg.sender sends Ether to repay an account's borrow in the cEther market. The provided Ether is applied towards the borrow balance, any excess is refunded.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrower account to repay on behalf of.

functionDecorators.name: repayBehalfExplicit
functionDecorators.description: msg.sender sends Ether to repay an account's borrow in a cEther market. The provided Ether is applied towards the borrow balance, any excess is refunded.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrower account to repay on behalf of.

parameterDecorators.name: pEther_
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the cEther contract to repay in.
